#summary Tutorial: Description how to get a WebGL compatible browser.
#sidebar TableOfContents

Please install latest [http://www.google.com/chrome Google Chrome] or [http://www.mozilla.org/firefox/ Mozilla Firefox] browser.

Other browsers do *NOT* support WebGL.

As WebGL itself is not stable, APIs and their implementation change. We try to keep compatibility to current builds of the browsers.

To check the correctness of your browser installation you can have a look at the [http://gwtgl-examples.appspot.com/ demos].
